bibl.title: The Habits of New Testament Copyists. Singular Readings in the Early Fragmentary Papyri of John. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The most common singular readings concern spelling. Word order variations, word substitutions and harmonisations to context are also not uncommon. Omission of words is more common than addition.
bibl.seg: HEAD Peter M., The Habits of New Testament Copyists. Singular Readings in the Early Fragmentary Papyri of John. Avec résumé en anglais.
The most common singular readings concern spelling. Word order variations, word substitutions and harmonisations to context are also not uncommon. Omission of words is more common than addition.
